name: Slide Puzzle Painting (Art History)
description:
Explore these breathtaking masterpieces by icon painters. Genres from medieval, baroque, classical, romantic, and modern are explored.
Select your level with a choice of 6 grid sizes ranging from 3x 2 to 5 x 5.
Slide the tiles to form a complete picture.
Test your problem solving skills today with the most spectacular pictures


This game is packed with 100 pictures including....

01. Pablo Picasso
02. Giotto Di Bondone
03. Leonardo Da Vinci
